ComicInfo.Title: Boats That Are Not Steered
ComicInfo.Series: Kill Shakespeare: The Mask of Night
ComicInfo.Summary:
Juliet, Hamlet and Captain Cesario must escape the clutches of mutinous Viola and her pirate crew or else face an even larger threat – the cannibal Lucius.
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Reg | Regular Cover | Andy Belanger (a) & Shari Chankhamma (c) | 1 | Sub | Subscription Cover | J. K. Woodward | 2 |

ComicInfo.Characters: Captain Cessario, Hamlet, Juliet, Lucius, Viola
